name: Multiplayer Asphalt 8 edition
description:
Play Asphalt 8: Airborne Local WiFi multiplayer game over internet with friends (without strangers).

This application must be used together with original Asphalt 8: Airborne iOS application.

Open Game Network Asphalt 8 edition application makes Local WiFi game in global ranges



LOCAL WIFI OVER INTERNET

- Play Local WiFi multiplayer game over internet

- Play all Local WiFi game modes (Classic, Versus, Elimination, Knockdown, Infected)



MORE FEATURES COMPARING WITH WORLD SERIES MODE

Local WiFi game over internet advantages comparing to Asphalt 8 "World series":

- Knockout and Versus modes available

- "Create room" mode- free choice of:

- racing mode

- track

- count of competitors is managed by room owner starting race in any time

- "Join room" mode- free choice of created rooms (choice of competitors)

- Chat with other Open Game Network users
